title: SellingAgent Publish Confirmation Not Recognized
description: Agent loops asking 'Would you like to make it available' when user says 'yes please' - only recognizes explicit 'please publish'. Fix isPublishRequest to detect affirmative responses like 'yes' 'yes please' 'do it' etc.

title: Fix Misleading Published Message for Sellers
description: Seller gets 'listing is published' message but status is actually pending_verification. Fix agent response to accurately reflect listing status and next steps

title: Listing Verification Status System
description: 1) All listings published immediately when created. 2) Three verification statuses: not_verified - initial_verification - full_legal_verification. 3) Configurable visibility policy by status (default: show all). 4) Buyers can order but must pay 1000EUR refundable deposit to validate order. Buyer legal flow blocked until seller has full_legal_verification. Deposit refunded if sale fails.
